<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update some Service Portfolio SLA Commitments records if plugin "Service Portfolio Management - Premium [com.snc.spm]" is active.
This is done in a fix job instead of just additional XML files to prevent overwriting records that are loaded by a different "if" plugin.</description>
        <name>SLA Commitments: updates for SPM plugin</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var moduleGr = new GlideRecord("sys_app_module");
	moduleGr.addQuery("sys_id", ["56f3ede40a0006d400eb8970199d47f0", "56f47c300a0006d4019937ae8e4101fa", "56f5b7a70a0006d400d58f16fa401aaa"]);
	moduleGr.setValue("roles", "portfolio_admin,service_viewer");
	moduleGr.updateMultiple();
	
	var slaTrigger = new GlideRecord('sys_trigger');
	slaTrigger.get('61709662c0a8016701118a53a2ce183b');
	slaTrigger.deleteRecord();
	
	if (pm.isActive("com.snc.service_portfolio.sla_commitment")) {
		var roleContainsGr = new GlideRecord("sys_user_role_contains");
		roleContainsGr.setValue("role", "513b6c1d3be31300bc1e832b44efc43e");	
		roleContainsGr.setValue("contains", "34685a3bd7522200465eef637e6103e9");
		roleContainsGr.insert()
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>

</record_update>
